law.catch_line: In a proceeding to enforce a claim of an employee, an insurer may not assert, as a defense, that the...
law.text: In a proceeding to enforce a claim of an employee, an insurer may not assert, as a defense, that the employee is not a covered employee if the insurer has accepted or is entitled to receive from the employer, alone or in conjunction with other insurance, a premium for workers' compensation insurance with respect to the employee.
